\section{Analysis Configuration}

\begin{itemize}

\item Unit of analysis: Words (authorRole=true, sourceRole=true, addedRole=false)

\item Kind of network: Co-occurence

\item Normalization measure: Equivalence index

\item Cluster algorithm: Centers simples

\begin{itemize}

\item Max cluster size: 15

\item Min cluster size: 5

\end{itemize}

\item Evolution measure: Inclusion index

\item Overlapping measure: Jaccard index

\end{itemize}
